text:
The goal is to be able to create a set of files and only upon referencing 
e.g. with
  <patternset refid="war" mode="exclude"  />
decide whether the file for example need to go into a jar or whether they should
not despite being within the overall pattern.
creator: hauser@acm.org
bodewig@apache.org
text:
What you want can easily be done with selectors.  Use <or> with any number of
<filename> selectors and asign the <or> to an id.  Later you can either use
<selector refid="..."/> directly or wrap a <not> selector container around it.
